actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to income earned abroad by U.S. citizens living or residing abroad.

summary.text: Increases the amounts excludable from gross income as income earned abroad by repealing the provisions respecting such exclusions enacted in the Tax Reform Act and restoring former law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to income earned abroad by U.S. citizens living or residing abroad.
